snippet.title: Chronicles Of Sagrea - Demo Now Available!
snippet.description:
Get the demo now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2727670/Chronicles_Of_Sagrea/

The demo contains the first two chapters of the game. Progress is saved on the cloud so you will be able to continue your save when the full game is out!
All three characters are playable: Barbarian, Amazon and Knight

Chronicles Of Sagrea is an action-adventure game set in a medieval fantasy world in which you'll experience a thrilling journey through different locations across Sagrea as you discover the details of the story and confront numerous threats.
X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/LuisCHGameDev
